identity.name: GearGuard
identity.core_philosophy: The Control Room. Dense, functional, and precise. Every pixel serves a purpose. No fluff, just data and action.

usage.h1: font-heading font-bold text-4xl tracking-tight text-slate-900 dark:text-slate-50
usage.h2: font-heading font-semibold text-2xl tracking-tight text-slate-800 dark:text-slate-100
usage.label: font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500 dark:text-slate-500

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Chivo:wght@300;400;700;900&family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&display=swap');

status_colors.new: bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 border-blue-200 dark:bg-blue-900/30 dark:text-blue-300 dark:border-blue-800
status_colors.in_progress: bg-orange-100 text-orange-700 border-orange-200 dark:bg-orange-900/30 dark:text-orange-300 dark:border-orange-800
status_colors.repaired: bg-green-100 text-green-700 border-green-200 dark:bg-green-900/30 dark:text-green-300 dark:border-green-800
status_colors.scrap: bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 border-slate-200 dark:bg-slate-800 dark:text-slate-400 dark:border-slate-700

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-md shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white dark:bg-slate-800 border border-slate-300 dark:border-slate-700 text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 dark:hover:bg-slate-700 font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-md shadow-sm transition-all
buttons.danger: bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-md shadow-sm transition-all

cards.base: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-300 dark:border-slate-700 bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-slate-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Control Room' grid layout for the dashboard.
Use the 'Industrial Precision' aesthetic: sharp borders, high contrast, technical fonts.
Ensure the Kanban board has distinct, colored columns based on the status colors defined.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all serial numbers, dates, and IDs.
Apply the 'grid' texture to the background of the main dashboard area.
Use the provided image URLs for equipment and technician avatars.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or the provided grid texture.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, active, focus).
Do not use generic AI emojis.
